### <a name="ext-bb-select-context-ngisContextSelected"></a>*isContextSelected(state)*

Checks if all necessary properties are defined for selecting a context

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| :-- | :-- | :-- |
| state | Object | Current state |

##### Returns

Boolean - **
